title: Can't redownload Lol
body: When i try and redownload Lol and wait a long time after 33% it suddenly just crashes my whole computer and everytime i do the same again i crash. But when i uninstall Lol my computer stops crashing,  Is Malwarebytes Anti-Malware the reason why i can't play Lol?

replies.body: At this point in the process, the patcher wants to connect to the patching server to download updates but is being blocked.  I suggest going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions.
